channel.title: Comments on: Strawberry Roulade and Lemon Cream

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: What a perfect sponge you made. I still remember the first time I made a roulade. Let's just say that it was hard to tell it was a roulade!
item.content:encoded: What a perfect sponge you made. I still remember the first time I made a roulade. Let’s just say that it was hard to tell it was a roulade!

item.title: By: Julia
item.dc:creator: Julia
item.description: I love the lemon and strawberry flavour combination. Very nice roulade. Well done. I have very delicious looking Blackberry Roulade and Mocha Roulade recipes from Martha Stewart that I have been meaning to make. A bit of a reminder that I need to get on that!
item.content:encoded: I love the lemon and strawberry flavour combination. Very nice roulade. Well done. I have very delicious looking Blackberry Roulade and Mocha Roulade recipes from Martha Stewart that I have been meaning to make. A bit of a reminder that I need to get on that!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: I'm loving the ratio of filling to cake in this! It looks so delicious and luscious :D
item.content:encoded: I’m loving the ratio of filling to cake in this! It looks so delicious and luscious ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I love the last photo of the cross-section. You're making the most of the last of summer with the strawberries. The lemon cream sounds like it would be worth trying in other recipes too.
item.content:encoded: I love the last photo of the cross-section. You’re making the most of the last of summer with the strawberries. The lemon cream sounds like it would be worth trying in other recipes too.
